attributes.action: Abolish umbrella payments scam through agency's
attributes.additional_details:
Make it illegal for agency's to use umbrella scam to pay it's employees 

Clarity on who we work for as at moment they don't like responsibility so pass us around each other while none claim responsibility 

Make it illegal to pay for your wages no one should have to pay to be paid 

Abolish agency's at moment they decide who gets a pay rise and for 14 years it's stayed the same rate while everyone else has gone up 

Raise working rate for telescopic forklift drivers to £20 minimum .
attributes.background:
Look into agency's who use unbrella scam as a form of paying employees 

Also force all agency's to reveal the blacklist they all have for it's employees 

They keep creating loopholes to get around latest legislation well we want clarity on job duration and proper remuneration for our efforts .

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
